code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{connect}from"react-redux";import ProductItem from'../../ProductItem';import{fetchProducts}from'../../../redux_store/reducers/cart/actions';import axios from'axios';function ProductsContainer(_ref){var products=_ref.products,addProduct=_ref.addProduct;useEffect(function(){fetchProducts();},[]);return React.createElement("div",{className:"products container"},products.map(function(product){return React.createElement(ProductItem,{key:product.id,product:product,addProduct:addProduct});}));}var mapDispatchToProps={fetchProducts:fetchProducts};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{products:state.cart.products,filterProducts:state.cart.filterProducts};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ProductsContainer);
